tool_description:
AI-based Crypto Fraud Detection API offers predictive analytics to identify crypto scams or fraud addresses. It supports Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, and Polygon.

Swagger: https://swagger.smartrtrust.io
Website: https://smarttrust.io
API: https://api.smarttrust.io
name: Crypto Fraud Detection
title: Crypto Fraud Detection

api_list.name: /Polygon/fraud/

required_parameters.name: Wallet
required_parameters.description: Wallet address for which you want to check the fraud probabilty

api_list.name: /BNB/fraud/

required_parameters.name: Wallet
required_parameters.description: Wallet address for which you want to check the fraud probabilty

api_list.name: /ETH/fraud/

required_parameters.name: Wallet
required_parameters.description: Wallet address for which you want to check the fraud probabilty
